variable.name: TID
variable.description: Data collection time point ID (measured in months from baseline)

variable.name: PERINEUM
variable.description: Participant has had pain or discomfort in area between rectum and testicles in the last week

variable.name: TESTICLE
variable.description: Participant has had pain or discomfort in testicles in the last week

variable.name: GLANS
variable.description: Participant has had pain or discomfort in tip of the penis (not related to urination) in the last week

variable.name: PUBIC
variable.description: Participant has had pain or discomfort below the waist, in pubic or bladder area in the last week

variable.name: PEEBURN
variable.description: Participant has had pain or burning during urination in the last week

variable.name: EJACULAT
variable.description: Participant has had pain or discomfort during or after sexual climax (ejaculation or cumming) in the last week

variable.name: AVGPAIN
variable.description: Number (1=no pain to 10=most severe pain) best describing participant's average pain or discomfort on the days that they had - over the last week
variable.value: Most severe pain you can imagine

variable.name: BLADDER
variable.description: How often participant has had a sensation of not emptying his bladder completely after finishing urinating, over the last week?

variable.name: PEELESS
variable.description: How often participant has had to urinate again less than two hours after finishing urinating, over the last week

variable.name: SXLIMIT
variable.description: How much participant's symptoms have kept him from doing the kinds of things he would usually do, over the last week

variable.name: SXTHINK
variable.description: How much participant thought about his symptoms, over the last week

variable.name: SXQOL
variable.description: How participant would feel if he were to spend the rest of his life with his symptoms just the way they have been during the last week

variable.name: DISCHARG
variable.description: Participant experienced discharge from the penis (drip) in the last week

variable.name: RASH
variable.description: Participant experienced a rash or sore on his penis, testicles or groin arena

variable.name: SWELL
variable.description: Participant experienced swelling in his testicles
